content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Handbook, also known as the Internal Work Regulation (the “Handbook”), is applicable to EPAM SYSTEMS DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, S. R. L. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees shall carry out their duties in fulfilling and observing all their obligations inherent to their position, -, while complying with any the general or special instructions dictated by the company. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees must agree to and comply with the content in this Handbook, and any future updates, as a condition of employment. Failure to comply with the content of this Handbook, the Dominican labor legislation, or an employment agreement signed between the employee and EPAM (an “Individual Employment Agreement” or “Employment Agreement”), may be considered as a cause of termination of the Individual Employment Agreement, without liability for the company. Note, the general provisions of the Dominican labor legislation shall apply in all provisions not provided by this Handbook.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Offenses involving non-compliance with the Law, this Handbook, or an Individual Employment Agreement, will result in termination of the employment relationship for cause.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company may change or modify any policy or procedure in this Handbook at any time, in accordance with Law, court precedents, and/or new regulations or best practices. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Spanish version is available for download:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":388317,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/63c2d093-986f-4f95-8529-1b2ec934a436/EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK SPANISH VERSION - EPAM.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/63c2d093-986f-4f95-8529-1b2ec934a436/EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK SPANISH VERSION - EPAM.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"EMPLOYEE HANDBOOK SPANISH VERSION -
